trends: There have been no other sightings in Bralorne
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsin the summer of 2010 on the night of july 20\21 i was camping in my van right next to the old abandoned "pioneer gold mine" right next to the river which is located approximately 5 kilometers east from the very small town of brailorn british columbia which is located approximately 150 km north of vancouver, british columbia, canada. i was woken up to a somewhat loud sound but not too loud as it did not wake my friend who was sleeping right behind me in his truck. the sound mostly resembled an amplifier hum. i was sleeping under a sleeping bag and had a t shirt on and had my arms out of the sleeping bag. while this sound was being heard by me my hairs on my arms stood on end just like i was being effected by static electricity, this event only lasted approximately 5 seconds. it was pitch black outside, and i was really kind of scared to take a look outside to see what it was so i just lied back down and went back to sleep. fyi i am a believer in u.f.os. and i'm a member of *(possible identifying information deleted--cms\sg)and have seen the disclosure project video by dr. steven greer as well as many others, so i will tell you that i think a u.f.o. flew over my van in that valley. now whether it was an alien craft or a human reproduction craft i'm not sure but i'm personally convinced that it was a ufo so to speak. i would like to hear of any other reports like this in that area at that time. signed: *(possible identifying information deleted--cms\sg) thanks.
Summary: woken to amplifier humming sound and hair on arms stood on end due to static electrisity
